title: The Backyard
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR50L
description: What is in your backyard? In the book The Backyard, students will read about some things found in the backyard. Students will have the opportunity to identify the main idea and details as well as connect to prior knowledge as they read. Detailed, supportive pictures, a repetitive sentence pattern, and the high-frequency word the support early emergent readers.
reviewWords: backyard, ball, dog, fence, flower, hose, swing, tree
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main ideas and details
awareness: Sound Discrimination                : Discriminate initial consonant /f/ sound
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use the high-frequency word the
